articles.title: It's 60 years since the first American in space and tourists are lining up to follow his cosmic footsteps - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Sixty years after Alan Shepard became the first American in space, everyday people are on the verge of following in his cosmic footsteps.
articles.content:

articles.title: White House wants 70% adults to have first COVID-19 shot by 4 July - Eyewitness News
articles.description: In addition to getting 70% at least partially vaccinated, US President Joe Biden wants '160 million Americans fully vaccinated' by the same date, an official told reporters.
